variable.comment: Controls how much BEMF (0-no BEMF to 255-max)

variable.label: Strong Time
variable.tooltip: CV129 Strong reduction of sound after acceleration, Position 00-03 in Filelist

variable.label: Weak Time
variable.tooltip: CV130 Slightly reduction of sound after breaking, Position 08-11 in Filelist

variable.label: Speed Step 1 Exhaust Interval
variable.tooltip:
Time between exhausts at speed step 1, 1476/time,
range 1-65535, lower = fewer beats per second.

variable.label: Sound Loop
variable.tooltip: CV145 bitwise looping of sound slots if sound is spread over five elements, see manual

variable.label: Sound/Function Assignment
variable.tooltip: CV146 assigns sound or function output, see manual

label.label: Set function keys to turn on/off main sound and sound slots in Function Map
Slot Sound Levels, automatic and function key repetition rates, CV's 112, 113, 122 to 128, 145
Each slot can play randomly when standing or when moving. Set with checkboxes below.
Sounds can also be played by function key (set in function map), with repetitions and if sound
is made of five components can be made to loop for continuous sounds (see CT manuals)
